bibl.title: Identities in Diversity.
Images and Ideologies. Self-Definition in the Hellenistic World
bibl.author: PARSONS, Peter

bibl.note: Dans la part Two de l'ouvrage (Identity and Crisis in Hellenistic Literature, pp. 125-195), fait pendant à l'exposé de: Thomas GELZER, Transformations, pp. 130-151. - I. Writers and Scholars. - II. Audiences. - III. Greeks and Non-Greeks. - IV. Literary Inheritance. - V. Imitation and Aesthetics. - Voir pp. 171-195: Albert HENRICHS, Response.

Anthony BULLOCH, Erich S. GRUEN, A.A. LONG and Andrew STEWART (Edd.), Images and Ideologies. Self-Definition in the Hellenistic World = Hellenistic Culture and Society. 12 (Berkeley - Los Angeles - London, 1994) pp. 152-170.
